episodes.title: David Burns on the Cults of Psychotherapy
episodes.description:
David Burns is a legend in the field of Mental Health. He helped popularize CBT with his book, Feeling Good, which has sold millions of copies worldwide. In this clip from our interview on the Hardcore Self Help Podcast, he is discussing his development as a mental health professional and the trouble that our field has with cults of personality. 

Full interview: https://youtu.be/N_522et2wrs
